short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is used to support and help visual test recording process in TrueAutomation.IO

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TrueAutomation Test Recorder is a part of TrueAutomation.IO ecosystem.

Requires installation of TrueAutomation desktop application which uses this extension to automate your Web testing.

TrueAutomation uses advanced Visual AI algorithms to analyze your user interface, collect visual data and then identify recorded elements during test execution.

When you interact with elements while recording a test, TrueAutomation Test Recorder analyzes a webpage to define the candidate elements and remember them for later detection as objects within a visual input.

As a result of the recording process, recorded elements are associated with automatically generated actions in your test.

It allows you to perform codeless test automation by helping with test cases creation right in your browser.

You can flexibly manage the process using special features of the TrueAutomation Test Recorder - easily switch between the recording process and the test you are recording, pause the test recording at any time or cancel it at all if necessary. Also, you can always refer to the element tag you need on the page using a special built-in tool for this - the Element Picker.

Write your tests faster and make them more reliable. Try TrueAutomation.IO and get all the benefits of writing your automated tests!
